column5: NOICE!  Happy New Year Everybody.  Yo G, whatcha say to a early morning jaunt??  ayyyooo  Fiddlon

I still have no idea of the lengths or weight of any fish. I must have been in the 40" range on 1 or 2 though. I should have taken advantage of Fidels company to collect scientific data. I even carry a digital scale and tape measure!   Yeah, but you've got monsters up there!

FESTIVE GREETINGS!  Sorry, these reports would have made it to your homes/workplace sooner, but my internet has been down for a few weeks.  O.K. the pics:  These are from my solo journeys: Really had to do some lure variations spot to spot due to light and water quality. Most of the following were caught employing only 2-4 different lures. However, on occasion, I do have a lure that I use to attract them and once I get a follow, I quickly switch up to my closer lure. This combination has been working well lately.       Had a great day with a fanatic that has spilled some great wisdom, Highdrifter. We took advantage of the last “warm” day of winter before Xmas. I almost went topless.  We have a weird chemisty. When ever we meet, Fidel catches a fish within minutes of us meeting and I always close the day with a catch.?? It works when we communicate via cellphone too?  We did a great tour that day. Fidel on rollerblades and I was on a great garbage score mountain bike. We covered a lot of territory on the shore and on the islands. We both lost some fish and had great follows. We even ran into DSN on the ferry. Surprise, surprise.      I was mocked for this pose. Fidel was suffering from Pikeness envy. This beauty was caught at the end of the day   The holidays are definately a time to give and Recieve! This one was a big muddy water suprise.   You should've expected the hat.       No, it's real, not photoshopped. I have integrity in self-mockery.    Well, Merry belated Xmas and HAPPY NEW YEAR !!!!!!!!!!!!!   Love Snag!  P.S. Be good and be nice.  p.p.s Today I ran into fellow OFNer, RSX, at one of my fave spots. He hooked into a real beauty that snapped his line and stole his lure right near the dock. After a good cry we lamented the absence of fellow OFNer, Lucid.
Well done Snag !!! You certainly seem to have the touch for those Northerns....  Cheer !!!
Great report and pics!!!... and a belated Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year to you too!

Well done as usual Snagman!  Looks like you finished the year with some beauties  So what would you say has been your biggest Pike from T.O waterfront/Islands this year? Length? Weight?  Thanks for posting the reports.  Hope you have a great New Year. 007
great report and pics snag  thats some real good fishing and nice sized pike for sure
Excellent work on those pike snag.  Keep the posts and pics coming.
Great report Snagglepuss!  Love the frown shots.  Guess you're the pike master now.  Joey
Good work sleighin'em.
Beautiful Fish!! Way to go !!
Great year end Snag. Thanks
Very nice Pike!  Mike
"I have integrity in self-mockery"    Great set of reports...  Mike

WOW!!!  and  LOL!!!  Great report!  That one fish looks to be 40 inches! Guess they're cruising for food now that the weeds and forage is reduced around their usual dock haunts. Waida figure em out by covering lotsa ground!!
Good job Snag.
Beauty fish Snag! you ever consider fishing anything other than pike?! haha  cheers, UF

Great job Snag!!!  I have a new found respect for you now that I've landed my first pike.  After seeing those teeth on those guys, I have a new appreciation for all the ones that you manage to land!!!  Hope you and your family had a great Christmas and will have a happy and healthy new year.  Also...thanks for all the laughs with your great pics and reports this past year....
Some real nice fat Pike there! way to go!

wow sweet! i was just at a few of those spots today, and got nothing, not even follow, im still in awwww from ur report, btw i am disgusted in ur report j/k WTG!!!! my heart is broken, lol    i dont think they like me... lol, i mean what is it timing? Ive been to some of those areas like a dozen times, and got 1 to show for it, Im pike fishing depressed for now, LOL
yea nice to meet u snag  yea that fish was a nice a one  yea doggy where are u   hope to see u guys more this new year  like old times
Nice work Snag! Much love in 07
Don't feel so bad. Least you got one. I was also in the same locations and even saw snag fish, and I still ended up going home with my tail between my legs.
Cool, fishing in light clothing in late december for pike in open water. How often does that happen. WTG snag.
Good lookin' pike Snag.  Best of luck in 07
Amazing to see fish from shore into this time of year, that's just nuts.  RSX, don't worry about your lure, I'll catch that fish in the spring and return it to you like last time
brilliant once again!
